content:
⚠️ Modified the contribution.
Comment: 
Just got this in a clash and it was very unclear what the list of numbers was for, so I've added a couple of lines explaining that the list contains the other two variables of the triple.

"You are given a list of numbers that contain the other two variables and must find them in the list and give their indices within the list."
" A list of N numbers *from which to find the other variables*"

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Je l'accepte parce qu'elle est interéssante

I get more solutions than one triplet in test 3 : 

X=1989
  
a=1260 | b=1539 | c=X=1989
1587600 + 2368521 = 3956121
are equals : true
  
a=1352 | b=X=1989 | c=2405
1827904 + 3956121 = 5784025
are equals : true
  
a=1848 | b=X=1989 | c=2715
3415104 + 3956121 = 7371225
are equals : true

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: I like the challenge.
One thing - I don't see why you need us to give you the indices of the numbers. I think it is enough to give the answer to the equation, as it would be sufficient in any other situation.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Great idea, maybe quite complicated, but can be done
I think it`s needed to be tested more!
It is probably a bit unnecessary but seeing the indices as a requirement of the problem could change the first approach of some people
You are right, i probably checked it with the solution code instead of the one i made that can check for multiple answers
